info.title: Sendazi API
info.description: Sendazi is a powerful SMS and Voice campaign management platform. This API allows you to manage campaigns, contacts, groups, sender IDs, message templates, and more.

get.description: Send a single SMS instantly using a simple GET request. Perfect for transactional messages and quick integrations.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Recipient phone number (international, local, or with + prefix)

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all SMS campaigns for the authenticated user.

post.description: Create a new SMS campaign. You can specify recipients directly or use group IDs to target contact groups.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific SMS campaign by its UUID.
Retrieve the list of recipients for a specific SMS campaign.
Returns a paginated list of all voice campaigns for the authenticated user.
Retrieve details of a specific voice campaign by its UUID.
Retrieve the list of recipients for a specific voice campaign.
Returns a paginated list of all contacts.
Retrieve a specific contact by ID.

post.description: Assign multiple contacts to multiple groups at once.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of contact groups.
Returns all contact groups without pagination.
Retrieve a specific group by UUID.
Returns all sender IDs for the authenticated user.

post.description: Request a new sender ID. The sender ID will need to be approved before it can be used.

get.description: Returns all approved sender IDs that can be used for campaigns.
Retrieve a specific sender ID by UUID.
Returns all message templates.

post.description: Create a new message template. Templates support placeholders like [First Name] for personalization.

get.description: Retrieve a specific message template by UUID.
